name: UpdateRoomParticipantSubscribeRule
description: Update the Subscribe Rules for the Participant

RoomSid.description: The SID of the Room resource where the subscribe rules to update apply.

ParticipantSid.description: The SID of the Participant resource to update the Subscribe Rules.

Rules.description: A JSON-encoded array of subscribe rules. See the [Specifying Subscribe Rules](https://www.twilio.com/docs/video/api/track-subscriptions#specifying-sr) section for further information.

$ul: **date_created**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.
**date_updated**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was last updated specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.
**participant_sid**: The SID of the Participant resource for the Subscribe Rules.
**room_sid**: The SID of the Room resource for the Subscribe Rules

**rules**: A collection of Subscribe Rules that describe how to include or exclude matching tracks. See the [Specifying Subscribe Rules](https://www.twilio.com/docs/video/api/track-subscriptions#specifying-sr) section for further information.
